alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 3:31PM EST until January 16 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 10 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches with 5 to 7 inches possible for the foothills and western Maine mountains. * WHERE...Portions of south central, southwest, west central, and western Maine and northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 10 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...An area of low pressure will bring a period of snowfall to the region and make for slick travel, especially during the evening commute. Periods of moderate to heavy snow may occur with snowfall rates possibly exceeding one inch per hour in the afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
